title: Dawn: Diary 1
description: What kind of friend am I? Actually, I think I mean what kind of person am I? What kind of friend, sister, stepsister, daughter, stepdaughter? I'm not always a very good person. I know that. But sometimes I can't help it.Friends. Changes. Together. Alone. Dawn Shafer has moved from California and everything's changingâ€”way too fast.
author: Ann M. Martin
